title: [Self-Directed] The Evolving Role of Learning Designers and Future Directions in Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Post-Pandemic Acceleration of Digital Transformation Significantly Altered the Role of Learning Designers, Structured to Help Participants Understand New Job Trends and Expertise Through Real-World Cases

learning_goals: Learners can describe three or more core roles performed by instructional designers in educational settings.
Learners can propose two or more mixed-methods learning design strategies required in the digital transformation era.
Learners can logically explain the necessity of a hybrid job classification system for the professional development of instructional designers.
Learners can suggest ways to enhance the expertise of instructional designers through actual case analysis.

resources: Australasian Learning Design Case Study Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
